summary: Defines core type utilities for the Flet UI framework, including deprecated compatibility wrappers for material state and theme visual density, and a mixin that supplies a default string conversion method. These constructs help maintain backward compatibility and provide consistent type handling across the library.
business_intent: Enable developers to migrate to newer Flet APIs without breaking existing code by offering deprecation-aware wrappers and a reusable string conversion mixin, thereby simplifying UI component development and ensuring stable type behavior.
